summary: This document is a unanimous consent resolution from the Board of Directors of Jeepers, Inc., appointing Maria Tankenson Hodgelle as the resident agent for service of legal process in the Virgin Islands. The resolution indicates the board's compliance with legal provisions and is signed by several directors, including Jeffrey E. Epstein.

persons.name: Maria Tankenson Hodgelle
persons.context: Appointed as the resident agent for service of legal process on behalf of Jeepers, Inc.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: One of the directors who signed the resolution for Jeepers, Inc.

persons.name: Cecile Dorren Indyke
persons.context: Another director who signed the resolution for Jeepers, Inc.

connections.description: Both are directors of Jeepers, Inc., indicating a professional relationship within the corporation.
Epstein, as a director, appointed Hodgelle as the resident agent, indicating a professional relationship.
Indyke, as a director, is involved in the decision to appoint Hodgelle as the resident agent.

events.title: Appointment of Resident Agent
events.description: The Board of Directors of Jeepers, Inc. unanimously consented to appoint Maria Tankenson Hodgelle as the resident agent for service of legal process.

keyFacts: The Board of Directors of Jeepers, Inc. unanimously consented to appoint Maria Tankenson Hodgelle as the resident agent.
The resolution was signed by Jeffrey E. Epstein and Cecile Dorren Indyke.
